name: mncply
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)))

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), nat1))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈(Monic ` c1), c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), ((coeff ` c0)`(deg ` c0))= 1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), nat1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(Monic ` c1)→ c0 ∈(Poly ` c1))
⊣ (c0 ∈(Monic ` c1)↔(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧((coeff ` c0)`(deg ` c0))= 1))

-| wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), nat1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(Monic ` c1)→ c0 ∈(Poly ` c1))
⊣ (c0 ∈(Monic ` c1)↔(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧((coeff ` c0)`(deg ` c0))= 1))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), nat1)))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)))
